results.name: wordpress-mysql/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-7b94b84c9b-gnxrm Pod/wordpress-deployment-7b94b84c9b-bkhgp Pod/wordpress-deployment-7b94b84c9b-n7b5h], expected 3

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the expected 3 pods are not ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs <pod-name>`.
3. Verify readiness probes in pod spec.
4. Ensure necessary resources and configurations are available.

results.name: wordpress-mysql/wordpress-deployment-7b94b84c9b-n7b5h

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
